ModMetaData.name: Smaller Geothermal Generator
ModMetaData.author: Emoryoakley (Exiler)
ModMetaData.description:
This is a simple RimWorld mod that resized the original geothermal generator, adding four new sizes: 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, and 5x5. For more detailed information, please visit: https://github.com/emoryoakley/SmallerGeothermalGenerator.
這是一個簡易的 RimWorld 模組，本模組依照原版的地熱發電機調整了大小，新增了: 2x2、3x3、4x4 和 5x5 等，總共四種尺寸的地熱發電機。更多詳細內容請查看: https://github.com/emoryoakley/SmallerGeothermalGenerator。
